722486007.description: The pool with a view and sauna are the standout features of this double room. Providing free toiletries and bathrobes, this double room includes a private bathroom with a shower, a hairdryer and slippers. The spacious air-conditioned double room provides a flat-screen TV with satellite channels, soundproof walls, a mini-bar, a tea and coffee maker as well as garden views. The unit offers 1 bed.

cribs_and_extra_beds.text: Additional fees are not calculated automatically in the total cost and will have to be paid for separately during your stay.
The maximum number of cribs, extra beds, and children allowed in existing beds can vary depending on the option booked.
All cribs and extra beds are subject to availability.

children_at_the_property.text: Children of all ages are welcome.
Children 18 and above will be charged as adults at this property.
To see correct prices and occupancy info, add the number and ages of children in your group to your search.

prepayment.description: You'll be charged a prepayment of 50% of the total price after reservation.

cancellation.description: You can cancel for free until 3 days before arrival. You’ll be charged 50% of the total price if you cancel within 3 days of arrival. If you don't show up, the no-show fee will be the same as the cancellation fee.

stages.text_refundable: You'll get a full refund if you cancel before 11:59 PM on December 16, 2025.
stages.text: Free cancellation until 11:59 PM on Dec 16

stages.text_refundable: If you cancel before 12:00 AM on December 17, 2025, you'll get a US$ 286 refund.
